title: Anyone selling any Tip O'Neil cards?
author: cdn_collector

posts.post_title: Anyone selling any Tip O'Neil cards?
posts.post_content:
Kind of on a whim here, but I'm thinking it'd be cool to pickup a Tip O'Neil card.  I only own one -- his N184 -- so anything else would be cool.  Am looking for a strong image, and don't mind a bit of back damage.  Would *prefer* something graded, but that's not a must.

Am looking to pay using PayPal.

Post, PM or email (richard@richardarmstrong.ca).

Thanks for looking!

Richard.
